Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implementing the menu functionality of the application

      Volunteer v
      The default volunteer that is populated when a user logs in

      • printMenu

        public java.lang.String printMenu(Volunteer v)
        A method to print the menu with a volunteer parameter, returns the default menu if the user is not logged in and the custom menu if a user is logged in
        Parameters:
        v - the volunteer object that is currently logged in
        Returns:
        the string menu corresponding to whether or not a user is logged in
